description: Grassy-leaved sweet flag (Acorus gramineus 'Pusillus Minimus Aureus') is an amazing plant species. It features glossy golden leaves and a mounding, vase-shaped growth habit. The edges of the leaves display an eye-catching yellow-green border. Its fragrant foliage fills the air with a sweet, cinnamony scent, adding a touch of luxury to outdoor living spaces. The plant is drought-tolerant and easy to maintain, making it perfect for residential gardens. Furthermore, it's a great choice for taking a walk-in the rain, providing a cheerful and cheerful backdrop regardless of weather conditions. With its unique, vibrant colors and welcoming aroma, Grassy-leaved sweet flag is an ideal way to add a jaw-dropping beauty to the garden.
